featured.text: Until now, only smaller tea brands have been certified, but awareness is growing.
In Asia, Western names were used until 2000 when the committee decided to use Asian names to 35 Asians’ awareness of typhoons.

definition.zh_def: 意識；對某事物的認識或了解。
definition.en_def: The state of being conscious of something; knowledge or perception of a situation or fact.
definition.example: Her awareness of environmental issues has increased over the years.
